title: Android 13 DP1 for some Pixel devices includes a Camera Obfuscator app
content:
Google has finally released the first Android 13 developer preview build for its Pixel devices. The update packs a host of new features and changes that will make their way to users with the next major Android upgrade, including new APIs, developer tools, new Quick Settings tiles, and more. In addition, Android 13 DP1 for

The post Android 13 DP1 for some Pixel devices includes a Camera Obfuscator app appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 DP1 for some Pixel devices includes a Camera Obfuscator app that Googlers use internally to strip metadata from images before sharing.
